show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: My guest Enrico Gnaulati PhD and I cover two separate subjects:   First, we discuss the subtle differences between the... <!--more--> view that childhood “disorders” have no scientific basis (my view) and that childhood disorders are greatly overdiagnosed (his).  For the second half hour, my guest provides an incredibly informed analysis of how we are suppressing the normal behavior of boys in our schools, families and culture.  His message has vast importance.
